name: Malibu Outdoor Black Tier/Flood Light Kit with Transformer & Cable
description: The Malibu 8-Light Outdoor Black Tier/Flood Light Kit features 6 tier lights and 2 flood lights made of durable, corrosion-resistant metal. Use the kit to create a unique exterior lighting design for your home. In addition to the 6-lights, the kit comes with a 150-watt transformer and 75 ft. of low-voltage cable.Durable metal construction is ideal for outdoor installationClear glass lenses and plastic ribbed globes for diverse illumination optionsLights install in the ground to deliver targeted spot- and walkway lightingWaterproof and corrosion resistant for durabilityTier lights use amber, 7 watt incandescent wedge bulbs (included)flood lights use amber, 20 watt halogen bi-pin bulbs (included)Brightness - 29 Lumens (tier)Brightness - 145 Lumens (flood)CSA listedIncludes six 7 watt tier lights, two 20 watt flood lights, a 150 watt transformer and 75 ft. of 14-Gauge landscape cableHome Depot Protection Plan:

attributes.value: Adjustable Lamp Head,Dusk to Dawn,Waterproof,Weather Resistant
